title: Authorization Access (Direct) - Negative
test_description: Authorization Access (Direct) - Negative: Test that user2 cannot SELECT from a different table without any permissions. Access should fail with permission error.
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const accessStep = stepResults.test_unauthorized_table_access; const expected_result = 'Result: Query fails.'; let actual_result = ''; if (!accessStep || !accessStep.data) { actual_result = 'No response from table access test.'; return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from table access test', code: 'AUTH_ACCESS_DIRECT_NEGATIVE_NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'OQ-105-7', title: 'Authorization Access (Direct) - Negative', expected_result, actual_result }; } const data = accessStep.data; if (data.status && data.status.state === 'FAILED') { const errorMsg = data.status.error ? data.status.error.message : ''; if (errorMsg && (errorMsg.indexOf('permission') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('Permission') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('PERMISSION') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('access') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('Access') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('ACCESS') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('denied') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('Denied') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('DENIED') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('Forbidden') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('FORBIDDEN') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('forbidden') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('INSUFFICIENT_PRIVILEGES') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('privileges') !== -1 || errorMsg.indexOf('Privileges') !== -1)) { actual_result = 'Access denied: ' + errorMsg; return { status: 'pass', message: 'Authorization validation passed: User2 access properly denied to iq_oq_demo.gold.patient_summary', code: 'AUTH_ACCESS_DIRECT_NEGATIVE_PASSED', test_id: 'OQ-105-7', title: 'Authorization Access (Direct) - Negative', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { actual_result = 'Query failed: ' + errorMsg; return { status: 'fail', message: 'Query failed but not due to permission error: ' + errorMsg, code: 'AUTH_ACCESS_DIRECT_NEGATIVE_UNEXPECTED_ERROR', test_id: 'OQ-105-7', title: 'Authorization Access (Direct) - Negative', expected_result, actual_result }; } } else if (data.status && data.status.state === 'SUCCEEDED') { actual_result = 'Query succeeded (should have failed).'; return { status: 'fail', message: 'Authorization validation failed: User2 access was not denied to iq_oq_demo.gold.patient_summary', code: 'AUTH_ACCESS_DIRECT_NEGATIVE_FAILED', test_id: 'OQ-105-7', title: 'Authorization Access (Direct) - Negative', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { actual_result = 'Failed to execute table access test query.'; return { status: 'fail', message: actual_result, code: 'AUTH_ACCESS_DIRECT_NEGATIVE_ERROR', test_id: 'OQ-105-7', title: 'Authorization Access (Direct) - Negative', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
